text: Emine Erdoğan, born as Emine Gülbaran, (born 16 February 1955 in Üsküdar, Istanbul) is the First Lady of Turkey and the wife of current Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. They were married on 4 July 1978. She is of arabic descent. Her family is originally from Siirt in southeast Turkey. She went to Istanbul Mithatpaşa Vocational Institute for Girls. == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Arab people Category:First Ladies Category:People from Istanbul
title: Emine Erdoğan
